name: Cops and Robbers! (Local 2-Player) (VMJ 2020 1/10)
description:
Two, players, one keyboard, and one diamond. Will the Robber steal the diamond and escape, or will the Cop find the Robber and take him down? Who will win?

When the Robber has the

COP CONTROLS:
P to attack, Arrows to move. You can only attack every 2 seconds.

ROBBER CONTROLS:
WASD to move, grab the diamond and get back to the truck to win. You can press space to attack the cop, but it will decrease your speed. (Stuns cop for 3 seconds, 10-second cooldown)

Music:

Operation CAIRO by HEROICIS.
